thread.title: Jose Mourinho furious over Manchester United fixture schedule as FA Cup clash with Chelsea is moved
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho furious over Manchester United fixture schedule as FA Cup clash with Chelsea is moved

author: David McDonnell
title: Jose Mourinho furious over Manchester United fixture schedule as FA Cup clash with Chelsea is moved
text:
Sport Jose Mourinho furious over Manchester United fixture schedule as FA Cup clash with Chelsea is moved The Red Devils are set to take on Chelsea on March 13, just four days before the second leg of their Europa League tie - but Mourinho insists he will not play his kids at Stamford Bridge Share Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho (Photo: AFP) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jose Mourinho is furious Manchester United' s FA Cup tie at Chelsea has been scheduled just days before their Europa League tie. 
United eased into the last 16 of the Europa League with a 4-0 aggregate win over St Etienne, then Mourinho revealed his anger at the staging of their Stamford Bridge clash with his former club. 
Chelsea host United on March 13 , just four days before the second leg of United's Europa League tie, with their opponents to be revealed in Friday's draw. 
Mourinho said: “I feel really surprised that the decision is made before our draw in Europe, because at this moment nobody knows where we play, where the first and second matches are. Mourinho looks on (Photo: Christopher Lee) Mkhitaryan celebrates after scoring (Photo: Tom Purslow) 
“Imagine we play Chelsea on Monday and go to the second match in Europe in Russia, Turkey or Greece? 
“I think once more the interests are going in front of the clubs and English football’s interests, and nobody cares about it. 
“I cannot play against Chelsea with the second team, I cannot play Chelsea with the U21s like Manchester City did last year. I cannot do that. We are Manchester United. City named a very young side at Chelsea last season (Photo: Getty Images) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
